string.name: face_guide_2d_way
string.value: Before starting, make sure the camera is clean, your face is unobstructed, and the environment is well-lit.

string.name: face_guide_2d_announce
string.value: You can use Face Recognition to unlock your device and open locked apps.Click "Start typing" to indicate your consent

string.name: face_guide_3d_way
string.value: First, position your face in the frame. Then slowly move your head in a circle while looking at the screen to show all angles of your face.

string.name: face_guide_3d_announce
string.value: You can use Face Recognition to unlock your device, confirm payments, open locked apps, and more.Click "Start typing" to indicate your consent

string.name: face_unlock_guide_3d_tip1
string.value: Make sure that the camera is clean, your face is not covered, and you are in a well-lit environment (avoid direct sunlight).

string.name: enroll_info_over_max_faces
string.value: The input exceeds the upper limit

string.name: enroll_info_busy
string.value: Face flow in progress, request BUSY

string.name: enroll_info_has_registered
string.value: The current face has been entered

string.name: face_enroll_too_left
string.value: Face too far to the left

string.name: face_enroll_too_right
string.value: Face too far to the right

string.name: face_rotate_too_left
string.value: Too much head to the left

string.name: face_rotate_too_high
string.value: Head raised at too high an Angle

string.name: face_rotate_too_right
string.value: Head turned too far to the right

string.name: enroll_info_rotate_bottom_right
string.value: Face with chin to the right

string.name: enroll_info_rotate_bottom_left
string.value: Face with chin to the left

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_01
string.value: Face Recognition is a biometric identification technology that allows your phone to recognize the features of your face. It uses the front camera to capture facial data, and then compares it to pre-stored data to quickly verify your identity. You can use this feature to unlock your device, open locked apps, and more.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_02
string.value: Please note the following when setting up this feature:

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_03
string.value: Make sure that the camera lens is clean.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_04
string.value: Scan your face in a well-lit environment, avoiding direct sunlight.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_05
string.value: Avoid covering your face with items of clothing, hair, sunglasses, masks, or thick makeup.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_06
string.value: Make sure your face is completely displayed in the frame. Look straight at the camera, and avoid raising and lowering your head or closing your eyes.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_07
string.value: Make sure that no one else appears in the frame.。

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_08
string.value: Please note the following when using Face Recognition:

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_09
string.value: Face Recognition may not work as well in dim, very bright, or backlit environments, or if the angle between your face and the camera is too great.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_10
string.value: There is a small chance that your device may be unlocked by people that closely resemble you or by objects that represent close depictions of your likeness.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_11
string.value: To prevent Face Recognition from being used without your consent, please exercise caution before allowing other people to use your device.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_12
string.value: The functionality of Face Recognition may also be affected in scenarios other than those described above.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_14
string.value: Your facial data is rigorously protected. This data is encrypted and stored in an isolated zone on your device, where it will not be copied by Huawei, and cannot be copied or accessed by any app. When you use Face Recognition in an app, the app is only informed whether or not verification is successful, and cannot access your actual facial data.

string.name: face_recognize_annouce_message_15
string.value: As the owner of your facial data, you are entitled to decide how you use the Face Recognition feature. For example, if you don\'t want to use Face Recognition to access App Lock, you can disable this feature in Settings. You can also choose to permanently delete your facial data from your device.
